projects.title: Plants
projects.bodyText:
- Plants.com features a diverse inventory from indoor air purifiers to outdoor bloomers, catering to every type of plant enthusiast.
 - delivering freshness right to your doorstep.
 - **Gift Options and Care Guides** The site offers curated gift selections and comprehensive care instructions.

projects.title: 1800Flowers.com
projects.bodyText:
- 1800Flowers.com offers a vast selection of flowers, plants, gourmet gifts, and personalized items, catering to various occasions and tastes.
 - **Nationwide Delivery** With nationwide delivery options, 1800Flowers.com ensures that your gifts can reach your loved ones wherever they are, providing convenient and reliable service.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.bodyText:
- **Technological Stack** Utilizing modern web development technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with libraries such as React.js.
 - The weather-app offers an interactive and dynamic user experience.
 - **API Integration** The app integrates with weather APIs (such as OpenWeatherMap or WeatherStack) to fetch real-time weather data, providing users with accurate forecasts and conditions for their chosen locations.

projects.title: Create Job App
projects.bodyText:
- This application for generating job cards or similar documents.
 - **Form Interface** A form interface for users to input job details such as title, description, requirements.

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
